title: Online DevOps Dojo
description: Aprendiendo DevOps desde la práctica. Estos laboratorios te ayudaran a entender desde la experimentación en un ambinte seguro, lo que aprendiste en la Digital DevOps Academy

courses.title: Bienvenidos
courses.description: Iniciando: entendiendo el contexto de la historia, configurando el entorno.

courses.title: Leading Change
courses.description: Learn about the importance of Leading Change in DevOps Transformations. A large factor in the success of DevOps transformations is driven by the organization's ability to empower people to lead change at the different levels in the organization.

courses.title: Version Control
courses.description: Version control is a system that records changes to a file or set of files over time so that you can recall specific versions later.

courses.title: Continuous Integration
courses.description: The process of merging work from all the developers in a team into the master branch as and when required.

courses.title: Shift Left on Security
courses.description: Security must be considered from the beginning and continuously assessed.
